docs.abstract: The post from World Health Organization researchers on the practice they call female genital mutilation (FGM) has prompted a couple of critical responses from other researchers. One is a comment from Richard Shweder of the University of Chicago, who calls it "bureaucratic boilerplate" and says it's further evidence that "identity politics has triumphed over science [...]
docs.lead_paragraph: The post from World Health Organization researchers on the practice they call female genital mutilation (FGM) has prompted a couple of critical responses from other researchers. One is a comment from Richard Shweder of the University of Chicago, who calls it "bureaucratic boilerplate" and says it's further evidence that "identity politics has triumphed over science and critical reason at the W.H.O."
docs.snippet: The post from World Health Organization researchers on the practice they call female genital mutilation (FGM) has prompted a couple of critical responses from other researchers. One is a comment from Richard Shweder of the University of Chicago, who...

headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Requiring Suicide Studies In Drug Trials
headline.main: F.D.A. Requiring Suicide Studies in Drug Trials

docs.lead_paragraph: Drug makers are being asked for the first time to put a comprehensive suicide assessment into clinical trials.

headline.print_headline: ABC Drama Takes On Science And Parents
headline.main: ABC Drama Takes on Science and Parents

docs.lead_paragraph: A new legal drama making its debut this month on ABC is stepping into a subject that is the source of heated debate among some parents — the relationship between autism and childhood vaccines.
docs.snippet: A new legal drama making its debut this month on ABC is stepping into a subject that is the source of heated debate among some parents — the relationship between autism and childhood vaccines.
